column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: Saul gyaa Filistiafo no do ka na ɔsanee no
column6: David wɔ En-gedi sar no do."

column2: "Nna Saul faa mbarimba mpensa a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn wɔ Israel nyinara mu
column3: na osii mu kɔr dɛ ɔrokɔhwehwɛ David na ne mbarimba no wɔ hamu mpɔnkye hɔn mbotan no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa nguamban no ho wɔ ɔkwan nkyɛn
column3: mbrɛ ɔbo tu bi wɔ; na Saul kɔr mu dɛ orikegya n'anan. Nna David na no dɔm no tsetse ɔbo tu no no mu noho ara."

column2: "Na David no dɔm no see no dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: da a EWURADZE see wo no nye yi
column7: mibeyi wo tamfo no ahyɛ wo nsa
column8: na ayɛ no mbrɛ woara ehwɛ a oye ma wo no. Nna David soɛree
column9: na otwaa Saul ne bataker nsiase ano bi nsumaa mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ n'ekyir no
column3: David n'akoma tui
column4: osiandɛ oetwa Saul ne nsiase no ano bi ntsi."

column2: "Na ɔsee ne mbarimba no dɛ
column3: EWURADZE mpa ngu dɛ mebɛyɛ mo wura
column4: nyia EWURADZE asera no no dɛm adze yi
column5: dɛ mebɛtsen me nsa aka no

column2: "Na David dze nsɛm yi siiw no dɔm no kwan
column3: na ɔamma hɔn kwan ma wɔannsoɛr Saul do. Na Saul soɛree fii ɔbo tu no mu
column4: na osii mu kɔr no kwan."

column2: "N'ekyir no David so soɛree
column3: na ofii ɔbo tu no mu puei
column4: na ɔtseatseaa mu dzii Saul n'ekyir dɛ
column5: Mo wura ɔhen. Na Saul buu no kɔn ekyir no
column6: nna David bɔɔ no mu adze dze n'enyim boom famu

column2: "Na David see Saul dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na itsie nkorɔfo hɔn nsɛm
column6: David rohwehwɛ ayɛ wo bɔn no?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ndɛ da yi w'enyi ehu mbrɛ EWURADZE sii na ɔdze wo hyɛɛ me nsa ndɛ wɔ ɔbo tu no mu: na binom see me dɛ munku wo: na m'enyi gyaa wo; na mesee dɛ
column4: Mennkɛtsen me nsa aka mo wura; osiandɛ ɔno nye nyia EWURADZE asera no."

column2: "Nkyii so
column3: m'egya
column6: hwɛ wo bataker nsiase ano bi na ɔdze me nsamu yi: na dɛ mutwaa wo bataker nsiase ano bi
column8: hwɛ na hu dɛ bɔn na mbrato biara nnyi me nsamu
column9: na mennyɛɛ bɔn bi minntsiaa wo
column10: kaansa ɔwo ereyɛ me kra ha eyi no wɔ hɔ mpo a."

column2: "EWURADZE mbua emi na ɔwo ntamu atsɛn
column3: na EWURADZE ndzi wo wer mma me: na mara me nsa dze mennkɛfa aka wo."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ tsetse mpanyin no hɔn bɛ no se no
column3: Omumuyɛfo mu na emumuyɛ fi ba: na mara me nsa dze mennkɛfa aka wo."

column2: "Woana na Israelhen epue ka no do yi? Woana na iritsiw no yi? Ɔkraman fun yi a
column3: ɔkramandwuw yi a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE nyɛ ɔtsɛmbuafo
column3: na ombua emi na ɔwo ntamu atsɛn
column6: na onyi me mfi wo nsamu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: David kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Saul wiei no
column5: Ana wo ndze nye yi a
column6: me ba David? Na Saul maa ne ndze do

column2: "Na ɔsee David dɛ
column3: Ɔwo eyɛ tseneneenyi sen me
column4: na ɔwo ayɛ me papa wɔ mber a emi mayɛ wo bɔn."

column2: "Na ada no edzi ndɛ da yi wɔ mbrɛ esi na enye me edzi no yie: susuampa dɛ EWURADZE yii me hyɛɛ wo nsa na ennku me no."
"Ana sɛ obi hu ne tamfo a
column3: ɔbɛma ɔdze noho sɔkyee akɔ? Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE ntua wo kaw pa wɔ dza ndɛ da yi ayɛ ama me no ntsi."

column2: "Na afei na mehu dɛ ampaara ebɛyɛ ɔhen
column3: na Israel ahenman no betsim wɔ wo nsamu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: fa EWURADZE ka ntam kyerɛ me dɛ innkoku m'asefo a wodzi m'ekyir no hɔn ase
column4: na ennkɛsɛɛ me dzin wɔ m'egya ne fie."

column2: "Na David kaa ntam kyerɛɛ Saul. Na Saul sii mu kɔr fie; na David na no dɔm no dze wɔfowee kɔr tu no mu."
